bill_title: provide for an interim study of  Deadwood gaming and the redistribution of proceeds.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to provide for an interim study of Deadwood gaming and the redistribution of proceeds. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. During the 2004 legislative interim, the Executive Board of the Legislative Research Council shall appoint an interim legislative committee to study the redistribution of the Deadwood gaming proceeds. The committee shall devote special attention to the following: (1) The specific impact of the increased one hundred dollar bet limit and the increased number of gaming devices in relation to the Gaming Commission Fund distribution formula provided in § 42-7B-48.1; (2) Methods to improve and revise the South Dakota State Historical Society's Deadwood Fund program established pursuant to subdivision 42-7B-48(4) by expanding the program's financial resources to benefit more qualified applicants throughout the state; (3) The feasibility of using additional revenue generated from the Deadwood gaming tax for promotion of tourism and Initiative 2010 as administered by the Department of Tourism and State Development. The committee shall submit its findings, including legislative proposals and other recommendations, to the 2005 Legislature.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
